title: Two more Universe Issues I noticed.

embed.description: Explore League of Legends cinematics, videos, lore, art, and more.

body:
Sorry for a low-effort post, but I noticed them while scrolling and wanted to get them fixed asap.

 - The release date of [Thorns of the Black Rose](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/leblanc-color-story/) is noted to be November 3rd, 2016. That's not a month or a year off, that's just wrong. It was released on the 29th of May 2019 during patch [9.11](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/creative-spotlight/911-lore-update) .
 - Mordekaiser's color story [The Final Reign](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/mordekaiser-color-story/) seems correct, but there is a duplicate just at the end of the website. It's a different story (the [URL](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/mordekaiser-color/) is different) with the same content, but it is missing art and the release date. It should just be deleted.

replies.body: Good catch, hope they do something about it

Thanks for the info everyone! 
We'll go ahead and work on getting these fixed right now. Much appreciated!
Thanks! Shared with the Universe team.

>The Tallest Daisy
>Sep 10, 2016

Hey, now I wanna go through and look for more errors!
EDIT: the URL is just "Evelynn Color Story", wonder if this shows up there because that's when her pre-rework Color Story was released.

I think these are intended, yeah. Or maybe not intended, but that's the reason for it.
Vel'Koz also got an updated color story and the release date stays.

Not to mention Varus has his old splash STILL up on his champion page..... after a year and a half.

https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/varus/
